featured.title: Intelligence: A Multimodal AI Platform for Smart Farming
featured.description: An AI-driven smart farming platform using multimodal data analysis, machine learning, and real-time insights for crop monitoring, disease detection, weather forecasting, and yield prediction.
featured.shortDescription: AI-powered smart farming solution with multimodal intelligence
challenges: Building an AI-driven farming assistant that uses image and text inputs for crop advice, disease detection, weather forecasting and yield prediction
Integrating multimodal AI capabilities for comprehensive farm management
Developing real-time insights and recommendations system
learnings: Machine learning model deployment for production

featured.title: Event Management System
featured.description: A comprehensive event management platform that allows administrators to create, update, and delete events while managing hall bookings and capacities. Students can browse available events, register seamlessly, and receive a unique QR code for entry.
featured.shortDescription: Complete event management solution with QR-based entry system
challenges: Developing a comprehensive event management system that allows administrators to create, update, and delete events while managing hall bookings and capacities
Implementing QR code generation and validation system
Building efficient database schema for event and user management
learnings: Full-stack web development with Flask framework
QR code integration and validation systems
features: Admin dashboard for event creation and management
QR code generation for event entry

other.title: Financial Data Management Platform
other.description: A comprehensive financial data management system to create and manage customer accounts, track financial transactions, and securely store input data with robust backend infrastructure.
other.shortDescription: Secure financial data management and transaction tracking system
challenges: Developing a bank management system to create and manage customer accounts, track financial transactions, and securely store input data
Implementing secure data handling for financial information
Building efficient database queries for transaction processing

other.title: Personal Portfolio Website
other.description: This responsive portfolio website built with React, TypeScript, and modern web technologies to showcase my projects, skills, and professional journey.
other.shortDescription: Modern portfolio showcasing my work and technical expertise
challenges: Creating smooth animations and modern UI/UX
